typelibsclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the array of WIN32OLE_TYPELIB object.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#guid → The guid string.click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns guid string which specifies type library.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#inspect → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the type library name with class name.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#library_nameclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns library name. If the method fails to access library name, WIN32OLERuntimeError is raised.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#major_version → The type library major version.click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the type library major version.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#minor_version → The type library minor version.click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the type library minor version.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#name → The type library nameclick to toggle source
WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#ole_types → The array of WIN32OLE_TYPE object included the type library.click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the type library file path.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#path → The type library file path.click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the type library file path.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#version → The type library version String object.click to toggle source
WIN32OLE_TYPELIB#visible?click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if the type library information is not hidden. If wLibFlags of TLIBATTR is 0 or LIBFLAG_FRESTRICTED or LIBFLAG_FHIDDEN, the method returns false, otherwise, returns true. If the method fails to access the TLIBATTR information, then WIN32OLERuntimeError is raised.
